actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill directing the Secretary of the Interior to include in the National Register the covered bridges within the Commonwealth of Kentucky.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior, in order to assist in the preservation of covered bridges significant in American history, to include in the National Register the 15 covered bridges in the Commonwealth of Kentucky.

titles.title: A bill directing the Secretary of the Interior to include in the National Register the covered bridges within the Commonwealth of Kentucky.
